topComments.author: Brandon Phillips
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Est√°vamos neste fim de semana para o Geico 500. Tivemos uma explos√£o absoluta! A pista e as √°reas associadas estavam limpas e organizadas. topComments.author: Dr. Rosie Ann Riley
topComments.comment: I have always wanted to go to this Speedway. I started watching the nascar races as a young girl (now 53). Became busy as an adult and never took the time to visit until now. Every quarter they allow the general public to come to track and drive their personal vehicle around track twice for $50. You get one practice lap and 2 more so 3 total. If I am correct, the Talladega has the steepest banking at 33 degrees. Of course I didn‚Äôt know this. When we got to curve I almost panicked üò± but I remember the gentleman saying not to. The car felt like it was almost completely side ways. The pace truck was in front to set pace. The idea was to go at least 75 to 80 in curve. The first time I drove 80 mph the 2nd and 3rd I went 90 and 95. The faster you go the better the vehicle handles. One lady said she slowed down and had to drive in the very bottom between yellow lines.  This was one of the best experiences I‚Äôve ever had. The entire staff was very friendly and helpful. It was also open day so we had a chance to go to garage area and look around. We were given souvenirs etc. After driving most parked and talked etc.  It was a wonderful day and I highly recommended doing this if you love racing cars! Still can‚Äôt believe I drove my personal vehicle on the Talladega Speedway!!!! And no worries there are all types of vehicles; trucks, SUV‚Äôs etc.
